question: My question is related to istikhara i had done few months back
answer:
QUESTION
I had done istikhara and had asked about a girl that whether she is better for me or not, in that 7 day period i saw her in my dream for the very first time (i hadnt ever saw her in my dream before istikhara), she was sitting on my right side and smiling, i am confused because i dont know what may be the interpretation of this dream, if you could please let me know i will be very grateful. Secondly i need to know the meanings of the name "Marina". Assalam-o-Alaikum,
ANSWER


Share:
1) There are positive indications of marrying the girl.
2) We do not know the meaning of Marina.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
